meta.title: Zodiac Compatibility Test - Love, Friendship & Work | DopaBrain
meta.description: Free zodiac compatibility test! Check your love, friendship, and work compatibility with all 12 zodiac signs. AI-powered analysis.

app.title: Zodiac Match Test
app.subtitle: Discover your compatibility with someone special

element.fire_fire: Dynamic and passionate! Both signs bring intensity and enthusiasm to the relationship.
element.fire_earth: Challenging but rewarding. Fire can learn stability, earth can learn spontaneity.
element.fire_air: Excellent synergy! Air fuels fire, creating dynamic and exciting energy.
element.fire_water: Complex dynamics. Fire evaporates water, but steam can be powerful together.
element.earth_earth: Solid foundation! Both signs value stability, loyalty, and security.
element.earth_air: Different rhythms. Earth is grounded, air is free-spirited.
element.earth_water: Beautiful harmony! Earth nurtures water, creating growth and understanding.
element.air_air: Intellectual connection! Both love communication and mental stimulation.
element.air_water: Interesting contrast. Air is logical, water is emotional.
element.water_water: Deeply intuitive! Both understand emotions and empathy naturally.

aries_leo.strengths: Both are passionate, ambitious fire signs that fuel each other's energy. You share a zest for life, adventure, and taking risks. Natural leaders, you support each other's goals with enthusiasm and loyalty.
aries_leo.cautions: Both love being in the spotlight. Competition for attention or control could be an issue. Try to find ways to celebrate each other's wins.
aries_leo.advice: Channel your combined fire energy into shared adventures. Be mindful of ego clashes and practice admiring each other genuinely.

aries_sagittarius.strengths: Perfect match! Both fire signs crave adventure, freedom, and new experiences. You understand each other's need for independence and excitement naturally.
aries_sagittarius.cautions: Both can be impulsive and impatient. Recklessness could lead to problems if not checked.
aries_sagittarius.advice: Your shared enthusiasm is your superpower. Balance spontaneity with some planning to ensure success.

taurus_capricorn.strengths: Both practical earth signs value hard work, loyalty, and building something lasting. You understand each other's need for security and material stability.
taurus_capricorn.cautions: Both can be stubborn and overly focused on work. Remember to enjoy life together.
taurus_capricorn.advice: Create goals together and build wealth as a team. Schedule time for romance despite busy schedules.

gemini_libra.strengths: Fellow air signs who speak the same language! Excellent communication, shared intellectual interests, and natural harmony make this a delightful pairing.
gemini_libra.cautions: Both can be indecisive or overly analytical. Balance thinking with doing.
gemini_libra.advice: Use your communication skills to explore ideas together. Keep conversations flowing and decisions moving forward.

cancer_scorpio.strengths: Deep water sign connection! Both understand emotional depths and intuition. Intense loyalty, natural empathy, and authentic understanding create powerful bonds.
cancer_scorpio.cautions: Both can be secretive or overly protective. Trust and open communication are essential.
cancer_scorpio.advice: Create safe emotional space for each other. Allow vulnerability without judgment.

default.strengths: Every pairing has unique strengths waiting to be discovered. Focus on your shared values and what attracts you to each other.
default.cautions: Different signs have different needs. Be patient in understanding each other's perspectives.
default.advice: Celebrate your differences while building on common ground. Communication is key to any successful relationship.
